allow:
Bash(python -c "
# Check the wheelNumbers inline styles
with open(''web/templates/gaming.html'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
    content = f.read()
    # Find the wheelNumbers div
    import re
    match = re.search(r''id=""wheelNumbers""[^>]*style=""([^""]+)""'', content)
    if match:
        print(''Inline styles on #wheelNumbers:'')
        print(match.group(1))
")
